document_data.caption: A map of Callidyrr showing Talffolk.
document_data.name: Talffolk
document_data.mainbody: '''Talffolk''' was a county located in the kingdom of [[Callidyrr]] on the island of [[Alaron]] within the [[Moonshae Isles]].{{Cite interactive atlas}}{{Cite dungeon/196/Backdrop: The Moonshae Isles}}
document_data.Geography: Talffolk was found in northern Callidyrr. Its borders were marked by the [[Sea of Swords]] to the east, the [[Swanmay River]] to the south and west, and by the southern edge of the [[Fairheight Range]] in the north. The Swanmay River served as the border between Talffolk and both [[Stirgewick]] and [[Stagford]].
document_data.Notable Locations: The capital of [[Caer Callidyrr]] sat within Talffolk, making it the most populous of Callidyrr's four counties. The eastern half of the ominous [[Dernall Forest]] was also found here. The [[High King's Road]] connected Talffolk with [[Fairheight]] and Stirgewick, in addition to making travel between the small towns and villages easy.
